value.title: How to monitor your Azure Data Factory pipelines visually using Gantt views | Azure Friday
value.excerpt: Gaurav Malhotra joins Scott Hanselman to show how you can use Gantt views to visualize your pipeline and activity runs. Look at the Gantt view per pipeline, or group by pipeline annotations/tags you create.  Visually monitor Azure data factories (docs) https://aka.ms/azfr/584/01  Enhanced monitoring
